Title: ‘Art of Living event completely destroyed Yamuna riverbed’
Content: The Sri Sri Ravi Shankar-led Art of Living’s three-day “World Culture Festival,” organised on the ecologically-sensitive Yamuna banks earlier this year, has “completely destroyed” the riverbed, noted
Author: Bindu Shajan Perappadan
Description: The Sri Sri Ravi Shankar-led Art of Living’s three-day “World Culture Festival,” organised on the ecologically-sensitive Yamuna banks earlier this year, has “completely destroyed” the riverbed, noted
